q: BBC as an editor and executive. Now, he is replacing former News of the World editor Andy Coulson as David Cameron 's top media advisor. Announcing Mr Oliver's appointment, Mr David Cameron said: Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist. He will do an excellent job in explaining and communicating the government's programme. Mr Oliver said: "I'm delighted and privileged to be joining David Cameron and his team at such an exciting and challenging time. The singer, who is a good friend of show boss Simon Cowell , said that he would be happy to take a judging or mentoring role on the new series. He told the Daily Mail: Simon Cowell and I have talked about doing things together and I always try to be supportive of people who are friends of mine. Simon Cowell previously described Usher as a "great mentor" but questioned whether he could afford enough time to the programme.

I'm glad the actors are retaliating. Planned Parenthood's staunchest allies in Congress- primarily liberal Democrats- have vowed to fight the proposed funding cut. In my community, Planned Parenthood is a very highly regarded mainstream organization, said Rep. Lois Capps , D-Calif., who depicted Mike Pence 's bill as "driven by an extreme ideological agenda." He suggested that other great repositories of culture- the British Museum and New York's Metropolitan Museum of Art- were equally vulnerable to plunder or destruction. It can happen to any place in the world, said Zahi Hawass , who faces demands for higher wages from antiquities workers who demonstrated outside his office this week.
